description.plain:
Marian Mereba (b. September 19, 1987), known mononymously as Mereba, is a singer, songwriter, and producer based between Atlanta and Los Angeles. She is known for frequent collaborations with members of the Atlanta-based collective, Spillage Village.

After years of singles and EPs, she released her debut album, The Jungle Is the Only Way Out, on February 27, 2019.
